author: Barry Roche
title: Coronavirus: Cork nursing home the first to pilot new symptom alert software
description: Technology alerts staff members remotely if their body temperature gets too high
content:
A Cork nursing home has become the first in the country to pilot an innovative piece of remote temperature checking software that can detect early Covid-19 warning symptoms in staff.
This week Taoiseach Leo Varadkar acknowledged those in nursing homes, being… [+3095 chars]
